channel.title: Need help with all clients!
channel.description:
Hey, Whenever i try to run any client for any server the black box or w.e. you wanna call it either says "'JAVA'" is not recognized as an internal or external command or the black screen pops up and goes strait back down.
On the Silab client it says something diff, this is what it says:
C:\Documents and Settings\Pat *******\Desktop\silabclient>java -Xmx512m -jar Si labClient.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Documents and Settings\Pat *******\Desktop\silabclient>pause Press any key to continue . . .
Please help me solve my problems!!!! *******= my last name i blocked it out.

item.title: Need help with all clients!
item.dc:creator: @dad9000 dad9000
item.description:
@dad9000 wrote:

Hey,
Whenever i try to run any client for any server the black box or w.e. you wanna call it either says “‘JAVA’” is not recognized as an internal or external command or the black screen pops up and goes strait back down.

On the Silab client it says something diff, this is what it says:

C:\Documents and Settings\Pat *******\Desktop\silabclient>java -Xmx512m -jar Si
labClient.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.

C:\Documents and Settings\Pat *******\Desktop\silabclient>pause
Press any key to continue . . .

Please help me solve my problems!!!
*******= my last name i blocked it out.
